definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: She later plans to commit suicide but she drops the idea due to her unborn child.
sentences.chinese: 可是，当她想到腹中孩子，即打消了轻生念头。

sentences.english: He was feeling black and ready to do himself in.
sentences.chinese: 他感到悲观绝望，随时都会轻生。

sentences.english: They don't believe their son would have taken his life.
sentences.chinese: 他们不相信自己的儿子会轻生。

sentences.english: Therefore, I cannot understand those who commit suicide.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我无法理解那些轻生的人。

definition: to drown oneself by jumping into the river
to jump from a building (to kill oneself)/fig. to sell at a large discount (in advertising)
cannot figure out/to be unable to take a lighter view/to take things too hard/to be depressed/to fret over trifles
to kill oneself/to commit suicide/to attempt suicide
to fall off or jump off a building
to lose one's footing/to slip/to take a wrong step in life
to sound an alarm/to report sth to the police
to fall into water/to sink/overboard/fig. to degenerate/to sink (into depravity)/to go to the dogs
to leave home (to live somewhere else)
to send or deliver to the hospital
